bibdata.title: IEEE Standard on Sound Recording and Reproducing Methods of Measurement of Noise
IEEE Standard on Sound Recording and Reproducing Methods of Measurement of Noise

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Noise is a limiting factor in any system which stores information because it limits the signal-to-noise ratio and hence the total quantity of stored data. This applies in the field of sound recording and reproducing, as well as in any information storage system.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
